wikipedia_page.main: John Bowers (born 18 May 1996) is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 7 April 2018 for Cambridge MCCU against Essex as part of the Marylebone Cricket Club University fixtures.

response: John Bowers or Johnathan Bowers may refer to:
*John Bowers (actor) (1885–1936), American stage and silent film actor
*John Bowers (diplomat) (1912–2004), Sudan Political Service mystic who worked for UNESCO
*John Bowers (lawyer) (born 1956), Principal of Brasenose College, Oxford
